title: '@' for Futura?
content:
Hi —

I'm wondering if anyone knows of a nicely designed '@' symbol that would look good used with Futura Extra Bold. I've tried all the cuts of Futura I have and a load of other fonts but can't find anything decent. The closest I've come to something near to acceptable is the '@' in LT Kabel Black, but that's not great. Anybody have any suggestions?

(PS. I've had a go at designing my own, but I'm no type designer and the end results looked crude as hell...)

Thanks
author: pbaber

comments.content:
Try Syntax Ultra Black.

If we knew exactly what you don't like and/or are look for, we might be better able to help.
